title: Diamond Mid Laner LF Clash Team

embed.description: Spheré / Diamond 4 15LP / 468W 456L Win Ratio 51% / Lissandra - 66W 52L Win Ratio 56%, Zed - 47W 48L Win Ratio 49%, Irelia - 35W 27L Win Ratio 56%, Zoe - 29W 32L Win Ratio 48%, LeBlanc - 25W 30L Win Ratio 45%

body: Hey diamond mid laner looking for clash team add me in game or post to this. spheré is in game name, dont forget the accent kinda annoying.

replies.body: Digital Fury Gaming is currently looking for a plat+ mid laner to fill our main roster, and wanted to know if you wanted in. if so, feel free to add me in game at shouri
would you join a low gold clash team?
i dont think you can, or it ruins the mmr of the team and makes it harder? i would be happy to but im not to sure
It'll bump the team up at least a tier, probably 2 if they're all low gold, but that's up to them I suppose :P

after my game I'll add you
and yeah it's overall MMR
